primary.title: Our Potato Varieties
primary.subtitle: PRIMARY SPECIALITY
primary.description: Potatoes are one of the most widely consumed vegetables around the world, and there are numerous varieties of potatoes available, each with its unique taste, texture, and nutritional profile. Some of the most popular varieties of potatoes include Lady Rosetta, Taurus, Santana, Sarpo Mira, Colomba &many more.
